subject: Re: [junit] Member variables become null between tests?
msgSnippet: ... JUnit creates a new instance of your test class for each run. Your tests should be independent of each other. Place shared (duplicated) setup stuff in
messageBody:
On Wednesday 18 February 2004 08:00, Ramanand Hegde wrote:
> Does junit initialize all member variables to null between tests?
> If so, how can I avoid it? I tried to implement blank setUp() and
> tearDown() methods, but that did not work.

JUnit creates a new instance of your test class for each run.
Your tests should be independent of each other.
Place shared (duplicated) setup stuff in setUp.
See also
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_2

Robert
